Supported Operating Systems:

Recommended Microsoft Office programs:

Microsoft Office Excel Viewer 2003

Microsoft Office PowerPoint Viewer 2003
does this convert office 2007 documents into documents readable in office 2003?

By installing the Compatibility Pack in addition to Microsoft Office 2000, Office XP, or Office 2003, you will be able open, edit, and save files using 
the file formats new to Word, Excel, and PowerPoint 2007
